title: Hi Guy, I'm Siwakorn
subtitle: Front End Developer
welcome_message: Simplicity and user satisfaction are at the core of my work. I have worked on several projects following Agile Technology, focusing on user responsiveness. I enjoy sharing knowledge with other, especially because of my deep understanding of CSS, which has made me proficient in Responsive Design, as well as my experimentation with various frameworks like React, Next.js, and Vue.js. I gowned my debugging skills through every project I have worked on and have experience in developing basic blockchain and NFT projects.
welcome_message_final: Lastly, if you require a front-end developer, I am confident in my qualifications. I can work with you to create the web application that best serves users. Thank you for your time.
